Name: The Delirium Vacation
About the game: As you eyes adjust to the darkness, you realize that you are not in your bedroom. Or are you? The bedroom seems familiar. Kind of like the one you had when you were little. Or are you still little? Things are so difficult to remember here. Your only option is to move forward and face the taunts of you inner demons fighting the encouragement of your inner hedgehog. The only way is deeper and down. Discover and escape 20 different puzzle rooms, avoid the roaming specters and vanquish your demons once and for all.
